name: System Shock
summary: System Shock is an upcoming action role-playing game developed and published by Nightdive Studios. It is a remake of the 1994 video game of the same name, originally developed by Looking Glass Studios. The game was planned to have a simultaneous release on Microsoft Windows, macOS, Linux, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One in 2021.
